org.bff.javampd.events

Interface PlaylistBasicChangeListener


  • public interface PlaylistBasicChangeListener
    The listener interface for receiving basic playlist events. The class that is interested in processing a basic playlist event implements this interface, and the object created with that class is registered with a component using the component's addPlaylistChangeListener method. When the playlist event occurs, that object's playlistBasicChange method is invoked.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Bill

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void playlistBasicChange(PlaylistBasicChangeEvent event)
      Invoked when a playlist event occurs.
